Package project.utilities

Class DataUtility

java.lang.Object
project.utilities.DataUtility
public class DataUtility
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains all the methods that accesses the established database "magnet"

  • Method Details

    • multiQueryUpdate

      public static void multiQueryUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> submittedstatements)
      This method helps one to execute more than one insert/update/delete statements to change multiple records in the database at once.
      Parameters:
      submittedstatements - An arraylist of statements to be executed

    • queryUpdate

      public static void queryUpdate​(java.lang.String statement)
      This method helps one to execute a single insert/update/delete statement to change one record in the database.
      Parameters:
      statement - The statement to be executed

    • queryUpdateRetrieveID

      public static int queryUpdateRetrieveID​(java.lang.String querystatement)
      This method is used when you need the auto_incremented table ID after inserting a data. Used especially for posts & comments.
      Parameters:
      querystatement - The statement to be executed
      Returns:
      the unique ID thats generated from the database.

    • querySelect

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> querySelect​(java.lang.String statement)
      This method returns a nested ArrayList of query results for a select query that returns more than one row.
      Parameters:
      statement - The statement to be executed
      Returns:
      An arraylist of all the results, each row stored in one arraylist of strings

    • singleQuerySelect

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> singleQuerySelect​(java.lang.String statement)
      This method returns an ArrayList that contains a singular result. This method is only used when the caller is sure that there's only one result.
      Parameters:
      statement - The statement to be executed
      Returns:
      The queried row of database data stored in an ArrayList of Strings
